CustomField.description: Defines the Bill To Account that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Invoice To Account", "Invoice To Contact" or "Assignment" are used. The Invoice Group By of "Client", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Client)", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Hiring Manager)" and "PO Number" will use the Client detailed on the Assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Bill To Account that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Invoice To Account", "Invoice To Contact" or "Assignment" are used.
CustomField.label: Invoice To Account
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Assignments with Account as Invoice To Account
